languages.text: "Это непреложная истина — вы глав{mf|ный|ная} на корабле, а я ваш слуга. Об ином и не смел помышлять".
"Ain't that the truth. You are in charge of the ship, and I am your servant. I wouldn't have it any other way."
languages.original_text: "Это непреложная истина — вы глав{mf|ный|ная} на корабле, а я ваш слуга. Об ином и не смел помышлять".

traits.locale_text: "Ain't that the truth. You are in charge of the ship and I am your servant. I wouldn't have it any other way."
"Ain't that the truth. You are in charge of the ship and I am your servant. I wouldn't have it any other way."
"Ain't that the truth. You are in charge of the ship, and I am your servant. I wouldn't have it any other way."
"Ain't that the truth. You are in charge of the ship, and I am your servant. I wouldn't have it any other way."
"Ain't that the truth. You are in charge of the ship, and I am your servant. I wouldn't have it any other way."
"Ain't that the truth. You are in charge of the ship, and I am your servant. I wouldn't have it any other way."

languages.text: « Ça fait pas un pli. Le vaisseau est sous vos ordres, et je suis votre serviteur. Je voudrais pas qu'il en soit autrement. »
languages.original_text: "Ain't that the truth. You are in charge of the ship, and I am your servant. I wouldn't have it any other way."

traits.locale_text: « Ça fait pas un pli. Le vaisseau est sous vos ordres, et je suis votre serviteur. Je voudrais pas qu'il en soit autrement. »

languages.text: «Toda la razón. Usted está al mando de la nave y yo soy su sirviente. Y que siga así».
languages.original_text: "Ain't that the truth. You are in charge of the ship, and I am your servant. I wouldn't have it any other way."

traits.locale_text: «Toda la razón. Usted está al mando de la nave y yo soy su sirviente. Y que siga así».

languages.text: “千真万确，大人。您是这艘船的舰长，而我是您的仆从，我对这点没有半点怀疑。”
languages.original_text: "Ain't that the truth. You are in charge of the ship, and I am your servant. I wouldn't have it any other way."

traits.locale_text: “千真万确，大人。您是这艘船的舰长，而我是您的仆从，我对这点没有半点怀疑。”

languages.text: 「それが真実です。あなたは船のリーダー、私はあなたの召使です。違う現実など望みません」
languages.original_text: "Ain't that the truth. You are in charge of the ship, and I am your servant. I wouldn't have it any other way."

traits.locale_text: 「それが真実です。あなたは船のリーダー、私はあなたの召使です。違う現実など望みません」

languages.text: "Das könnt Ihr laut sagen. Ihr befehligt das Schiff, ich bin Euer Diener. Anders würde ich es nicht wollen."
languages.original_text: "Ain't that the truth. You are in charge of the ship, and I am your servant. I wouldn't have it any other way."

traits.locale_text: "Das könnt Ihr laut sagen. Ihr befehligt das Schiff, ich bin Euer Diener. Anders würde ich es nicht wollen."

languages.text: "Doğru söze ne denir? Siz geminin başısınız, ben de sizin hizmetkârınızım. Durum farklı olsun asla istemezdim."
languages.original_text: "Ain't that the truth. You are in charge of the ship, and I am your servant. I wouldn't have it any other way."
